newsitem.title: USA: CellStar completes sale of centers to MCI.
newsitem.headline: CellStar completes sale of centers to MCI.

text.p: CellStar Corp said on Tuesday that it completed the sale of 331 of its communication centers inside Sam's Club locations across the country to MCI Communications Corp for about $16 million in cash.

CellStar said the proceeds of the sale will be used to reduce CellStar's bank debt and for general working capital purposes. The company said it would continue to operate its remaining 21 communication centers in Florida. MCI has the option to purchase those centers, if certain conditions are met, the company said.
CellStar also said it signed a distribution agreement with MCI to supply cellular phones and accessories for the communication center retail operations.
